title: Patch 6.12 - my loading screen doesnt pop up anymore
body: Is this happening to anyone else? it seems to be with my laptop after this patch i get into champion select then the loading screen doesnt pop up so i click the riot games icon and it just gives me the option to reconnect which i can't reconnect to anyway.

replies.body: Mine loads okay but it is a lot slower than it was previously.

This is very possibly due to a firewall issue. Can you go through the steps in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Thanks!

No it's not.

Just do a repair on the game, I had the same issue and got my first ever leave register, kind of annoyed at that, but what can you do.
